data.fullContent: Judy had always been a compassionate and caring woman. When her husband came down with a serious illness, she was willing to act as his nurse. As far as she was concerned, her assistance was all he needed. Sadly, as her husband's illness became more critical, Judy realized her assistance might not be sufficient.
data.answer: 朱迪一直是一个富有同情心和爱心的女人。当她的丈夫得了重病时，她愿意当他的护士。就她而言，她的帮助就是他所需要的一切。可悲的是，当她丈夫的病情变得更严重时，朱迪意识到她的帮助可能不够。
